directions: In a medium skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until evenly browned; drain.
Stir in beer, salt, sugar, pepper, and yellow mustard. Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low; simmer partially covered. Remove from heat the moment all the liquid has evaporated.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
title: Marty's Loosemeat Sandwich
